text: Just Between Friends is a 1986 American drama movie directed by first time director Allan Burns and starring Mary Tyler Moore, Christine Lahti, Sam Waterston, Ted Danson, Jane Greer, Mark Blum, Beverly Sanders, Lewis Arquette. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies about friendship Category:Infidelity in movies
title: Just Between Friends
